div.p: [NN] to Kleon, greetings. I have written for you below [...] son of Thamays: 13, Psenchonsis son of Haryotes: 9, [...] of Phanesis son of Sochotes: 12, of Ameneus son of Nechthyris 2[0-29]. [... I have written] to you for your information and as I wanted to open a sluice gate [...]. Could you please send also the storekeeper and [...].
To Kleon Translation with slight modifications: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 83, Â© Peeters
